杚字的基本解释

杚
gū
把东西弄平。

杚
gài
量粮食时刮平斗斛的刮板。

杚字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gài］
［《集韻》吉忽切，入没，見。］
［《玉篇》柯愛切］
同“1”。
古代量谷物时用以刮平斗斛的器具。亦谓刮平，使之均等。

杚字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　杚； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页512第06
【唐韻】古忽切，音骨。【說文】平也。从木从气，俗省从乞。【廣韻】摩也。　又【玉篇】柯愛切，音漑。與槪同。　又【類篇】古對切，音憒。義同。

杚字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
杚字的起名意思

暂无。

Ming
Basic explanation of words
Ming
gū
Smooth things out.
Ming
gài
Scrape the scraper of Dendrobium spp. when measuring grain.
Ming
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［gài］
["Jiyun" Ji suddenly cuts, enters, see you. ]
["Jade Pian" Ke Aiqie]
Same as "1".
An instrument used to flatten Dendrobium when measuring grain in ancient times. It is also called flattening and equalizing.

[Tang Yun] Gu suddenly cut, sound bone. [Said the text] Ping also. From the wood to the gas, the vulgar province is from the begging. [Guang Yun] Mo Ye.　[Jade articles] Ke Aiqie, soundtrack. Same as 槪.　[Classes] Ancient anti-cutting, sound stunned. The same meaning.
